input.content: You are a jazz musician with expertise in tetrad, or four-note chords, including seventh chords, slash chords, and more.

Start from the bass note in ascending order, what are the four notes in Cmaj7/G (or C major seventh over G). Respond in comma-separated notes only, ie. C, E, G, B for Cmaj7. Notation for flat is 'b', sharp is '#', double flat is 'bb', double sharp is '##'
